MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 and FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties on Binniehill Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.46pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 8:44PM on Sunday 14 February 2021.
